serialVersionUID

private static final long serialVersionUID

Constant Field Values

queue

private java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Packet> queue
Use BlockingQueue, which works with concurrency by waiting to add until there is room, and waiting to remove until there is an element in the queue.

users

private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UserHandler> users
Need to have a synchronized map for multiple thread access. One map for usernames to user handlers, another map for chat room names to sets of usernames.

chatRooms

private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> chatRooms

run

public void run()
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

login

private void login(Packet curMessage)
For users logging in or out of the server, we send notifications out to all other users.

logout

private void logout(Packet curMessage)
When a user logs out, have to make sure they are removed from all possible rooms and that models are updated. This is challenging. Can't change the chatRooms list as it is being looped through, so we make a set of packets to process and then process them afterwards

joinRoom

private void joinRoom(Packet curMessage)
To join room, have cases, either it exists or it doesn't.

Parameters:
curMessage -

leaveRoom

private void leaveRoom(Packet curMessage)
To leave room, first check if room exists. If does, remove self from the set. If the room is now empty, kill the room. Need to send notifications to the room that someone just left it.
